name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Turn In For Connections Academy

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the status drop downs to "Completed" on the overdue lessons page so that you don't have to change each one.
